backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing video sessions with prompt validation, segment tracking, status updates, and user/session queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for build and documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme color variables and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating the multi-step video generation flow with validation, clip generation, composition, and navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: UI layout wrapper providing header, theme toggle, background styling, and footer around app content.
Fixed bottom CTA bar rendering a configurable action button with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/ClipSegmentsList: Displays generation progress and status for video segments, with error handling and retry/back controls.
frontend/src/components/ComposedVideoPre: Handles composing multiple clips into a video, shows progress/error states, and enables downloads.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotice.tsx: Renders a destructive alert with a message and optional retry or start-over actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileStepper.ts: Shows a four-step mobile progress indicator highlighting the current step.
frontend/src/components/PromptComposer.t: Provides UI for editing prompts, clip settings, reference images, and Grok runtime configuration.
frontend/src/components/ReferenceImageUp: Manages uploading, validating, previewing, and removing reference images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching a session or user sessions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and document class updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoProvider.ts: Tracks and updates the active video provider, syncing with runtime config changes and enforcing provider constraints.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSession.ts: Manages video generation sessions, handling session creation, segment generation, errors, and reference images.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for light/dark themes with mobile‑friendly adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility for downloading video files from blob or remote URLs with error handling and extension inference.
frontend/src/lib/duration.ts: Provides duration calculations, validation, suggestions, and clip-splitting helpers for video timing.
frontend/src/lib/fileEncoding.ts: Encodes image files to base64 for API requests and handles errors for individual or multiple files.
frontend/src/lib/grokEndpoint.ts: Validates and normalizes Grok API endpoint URLs and provides a quick format check.
frontend/src/lib/grokRuntimeConfig.ts: Manages Grok runtime config in localStorage, including loading, saving, clearing, and change subscriptions.
frontend/src/lib/referenceImages.ts: Defines limits and helpers for validating, formatting, and previewing reference image files.
frontend/src/lib/videoCompose.ts: Provides simple video composition logic with progress callbacks, returning first clip as fallback for multi-clip cases.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Validates video URLs and clip data using HEAD requests or video element fallback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/providers/grokProvider.ts: Resolves Grok configuration, validates settings, encodes reference images, and sends video generation requests to the Grok API.
frontend/src/providers/videoProvider.ts: Manages video provider selection between Grok and Demo modes with localStorage persistence and config-aware defaults.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, container settings, and plugins for UI styling.
project_state.json: Project state file defining build summary, architecture notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the video‑generation app.
